subject: Coaches and Managers
Soccer
lead_paragraph: A revolving door of management prevails in the Premier League, where 195 head coaches have been fired or forced to resign since 1992 and 5 of 20 are gone this season.
snippet: A revolving door of management prevails in the Premier League, where 195 head coaches have been fired or forced to resign since 1992 and 5 of 20 are gone this season.
